name: Apple
description: Though he tried to start a boycott against Apple AAPL +0.55% in February -- after the iPhone maker refused to help the Federal Bureau of Investigation break into one of the San Bernardino shooters’ phone -- Trump held onto his shares in the tech company, which were worth as much as $2 million in May, according to Trump’s May 2016 Federal Election Commission filing, which provides a range of values for each of his stock holdings.
